requirements.title: Welcome Screen
requirements.description: Display a welcome screen after email verification with a personalized greeting, product value proposition, and options to get started or skip onboarding.
acceptance_criteria: Welcome screen appears after email verification
Personalized greeting uses user's name
Product value proposition displayed in 3-4 bullet points
"Get Started" CTA button is present
Option to skip onboarding is available

requirements.title: User Type Selection
requirements.description: Allow users to select their user type for personalized onboarding: Individual, Team Lead, or Enterprise Admin.
acceptance_criteria: User can select from Individual, Team Lead, or Enterprise Admin
Selection is stored in user profile for future personalization

requirements.title: Goal Setting
requirements.description: Present relevant goals based on user type and allow users to select at least one.
acceptance_criteria: Goals presented are relevant to user type
User can select multiple goals
At least one goal selection is required

requirements.title: Profile Completion
requirements.description: Collect essential profile information including display name, profile photo, timezone, and notification preferences.
acceptance_criteria: Display name is required and between 2-50 characters
Profile photo is optional, max 5MB, jpg/png only
Timezone is auto-detected but can be overridden by user
User can set notification preferences

requirements.title: Interactive Tutorial
requirements.description: Provide a 5-step interactive tutorial post-profile setup to guide users through key features.
acceptance_criteria: Tutorial includes steps: create project, add task, set due date, invite collaborator, complete task
Each step has highlighted UI element with tooltip
"Next" and "Skip" buttons are available
Progress indicator shows current step out of 5

ambiguity_flags.issue: No criteria for skipping step 4 if user is Individual
ambiguity_flags.suggested_action: Specify acceptance criteria for skipping step 4 for Individual user type

requirements.title: Completion Celebration
requirements.description: Celebrate onboarding completion with a confetti animation, success message, quick links, and help center link.
acceptance_criteria: Confetti animation is shown
"You're all set!" message is displayed
Quick links to common actions are provided
Link to help center is available

summary: Develop a guided onboarding experience to improve user activation rates and feature discovery.
